profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

Our service areas include and are not limited to;

For Ontario Service Area's
- GTA
-Toronto
- Barrie
- Pickering & Ajax
- Kitchener & Waterloo
- Guelph
-London & Southwestern Ontario
-Ottawa

For Quebec Service Area's
-Montreal
- Laval

For Alberta Service Area's
-Calgary
-Edmonton
-Red Deer

For British Columbia Service Area's
-Vancouver
-Richmond
-Surray
-Burnaby
-Victoria

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.
service_area:
Toronto and the GTA
Brampton, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Newmarket, Whitby, Ajax, Pickering, Oshawa, Mississauga, King City, Vaughan, Concord, Oakville, Milton and Caledon, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph
products: All products used are green and non hazardous.  In addition, they are approved by the IICRC for mold remediation.
services: Mold Inspection, Mold Removal, Air Quality Testing, Mold Testing, Asbestos Testing, Handyman Services, Fire and Flood Damage and Restoration in residential homes, commercial properties and pleasure crafts (motor and sail boats), Sanitization/Decontamination Services
brands: Only the best products and brands are used by mold.ca.  We work with professional Mold remediation suppliers.
specialities: Researching and employing the most up to date mold remediation practices in the industry. In addition, we have been assisting in the remediation of imported sea containers, sailboats/power boats and Condo/Apartment heating/cooling unit remediation.

profile: 'Providing top-notch services at competitive prices for over 12 years across the GTA. Summit contractors have been awarded best of HomeStars contractors for three years in a row since 2018. We specialize in quality home improvement, renovation and remodeling including bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, kitchen renovation and heating and cooling. Our professional team consisting of operating and project management, in-house trades, licensed plumbers, electricians, HVAC technicians and renovation specialists enable us to fulfill our clients’ needs within the budget and timelines with precision, clarity, a unique understanding of the design-build process.'
services: Construction services; Residential/Commercial sector. profile:
Here at FV RENOVATIONS, we offer very competitive rates for our elite services.With customer satisfaction being our main priority, we pride ourselves in the belief that our job is not complete until our customers are fully satisfied.
​
At FV RENOVATIONS, we strive to excel in our service. So when you hire us, you can be confident that you will receive the personal touch that only our skilled team can offer.
 
OFFERING UNBEATABLE PRICES FOR TOP-QUALITY SERVICE

At FV RENOVATIONS, customer satisfaction is the ultimate responsibility of all our employees.
Our commitment is to provide excellent services that will excel far beyond your expectations.By maintaining strong and friendly communication with our customers,
we continue to enhance the value and quality of our work to ensure you are completely satisfied.
 
 
Client satisfaction is not just a goal for us - it is an action plan in progress.
​
We don’t just believe in it - we live by it!  
 
FV RENOVATIONS -"QUALITY IS OUR STANDARD"

We specialize in residential, commercial and industrial projects - Full demolition guts, selective deconstruction as well as abatement services. profile:
We at DAT Demolition are a professional, full-service demolition contractor that will safely and efficiently demolish any room or structure, and leave it ready for your project.

BEST Service and BEST Rates in the GTA. Crews are standing by to get your job done now.

Demolition and Removal
- Residential, Commercial, Factory, Warehouse
- Renovation Prep
- Kitchens, Bathrooms
- Office Partitions, Load Bearing walls
- Demo concrete slabs
- Basements, driveways
- Floor tile removal
We provide professional residential, commercial, and industrial structural demolition services.

We take care of disposal, junk, or trash to make sure the site is clean and ready for the next stage of your project.

Call Dominic Taddeo for a free estimate at 416-731-5097
- WSIB covered and insured crew
- Guaranteed work
- Fully licensed and certified
